message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  However, $120 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $130. This is a fair price for both of us, and it still allows me to make a profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $125.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $125 is still a little low for me. I'm willing to go down to $128.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to get a good deal.  What do you say?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Alice, but I'm still at $125. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Is there any flexibility on your end?
